title: Female Boxer Tries To Kiss Opponent During Face-Off, Gets Slapped In The Face
text:
Female Boxer Tries To Kiss Opponent During Face-Off, Gets Slapped In The Face

Female Boxer Tries To Kiss Opponent During Face-Off, Gets Slapped In The Face

There is no shortage of madness in combat sport and that doesn't only restrict to the ring, but pre-match faceoffs too.

YouTube

Intense staredowns are a common theme at faceoffs ahead of combat sports, but things got a little out of hand at the weigh-in for the Super featherweight world title fight between Ewa Brodnicka and Soledad Matthysse when the champion planted a kiss on the challenger's lips.

While trying to rile up her opponent, Brodnicka, who is 16-0 in her career, went a step further than normal with a smooch on Matthysse ahead of their bout in Czestochowa, Poland.

It worked, but not really how she would have wanted it as Matthysse responded with a slap to the face as things begun to boil over.

It got very heated with Brodnicka throwing some slaps of her own before promoter had to immediately diffuse the situation.

That escalated very quickly. The faceoff was anything but normal, and both fighters made their feelings for each other very clear.

The fight between Ewa Brodnicka and Soledad Matthysse took place on Friday and it had fireworks as expected, but it was Ewa Brodnicka who came out trumps.
